OFFICIAL RECORD 
UNCLASSIFIED 
FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION 
Intake 
Date: 08/03/2020 
Case ID #: 50D-NY-3027571 (U) EPSTEIN, JEFFREY; CHILD SEX 
TRAFFICKING 
Drafted By: 
Date/Time Received: 08/02/2020 11:54 AM EDT 
Details: 
On 08/02/2020, at 11:54 a.m. Eastern Time, , cell phone 
numbe email address home 
address North Hollywood, CA United States 91601, 
Internet Protocol (IP) address which 
resolves to North Hollywood, CA 91606, submitted an online tip to the FBI 
National Threat Operations Center (NTOC) via tips.fbi.gov, to report 
information regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. 
Date Submitted: 08/02/2020 11:54:17 AM ET 
Transaction Number: 8Al2E05D-6FDF-428D-BFE3-Cp9212DA6636 
Threat To Life: 
Submitted Text: 
in 1996 I  was 19 years old, my entire art portfolio was finally ready to 
apply to art school. I showed my best art to former high school 
classmates (several were Israeli, 1 was friends with serbians who were 
friends with the princess of Yugoslavia and the lingerie model actress 
serbian-Canadian and her ex boyfriend the actor Matthew 
Settle who owed money and they set up an elaborate plan involving a 
false romance and grooming me to ultimately be approached by ghislaine 
maxwell and jeffrey epstein several days after all of ny artwork 
UNCLASSIFIED 
EFTA00020462

UNCLASSIFIED 
Re: 50D-NY
-3027571, 
08/03/2020 
disappeared while Matthew helped the 
Israeli moving company Northstar 
/Moishe's move me into my very first 
apartment in July 1997 when I was 20 
years old in Los Angeles. In retrospect there was a clear plot taking 
place, and I was introduced to Epstein early on at a bar next to were 
Matthew Settle Lived. 
I 
heard 
call him on the 
phone and ask on 
speaker phone sometime between April- June of 
1997 if Matthew had her 
money yet. He said to me she would send the 
Serbian mafia to hurt him if 
he didn't come up with the money. He did not mention that my artwork was 
where the money was 
going to come from. The friend of mine who told her 
serbian friends about my artwork which started chain of events 
culminating in the 
disappearance of all of my artwork is named Jasmine 
Dashtizad. One of my stolen paintings is of Bill Clinton's head on a 
woman (Hillary Clinton's) 
body. 
I 
painted it between November 1995 to 
January 1996. I was a teenager. 
I 
drew my own dental 
impressions in the 
Ray Johnson estate collage, I also drew 
one of my fingerprints. And 
that art is made out of pieces of my high 
school calendar which fell 
apart from overuse, so 
I 
glued the pieces onto thick cardstock and drew 
designs and draeings around the glued pieces. I also traced my own 
handprints on that art. I also drew a replica of the art on the cover of 
my 12th grade high school 
play production program and I also wrote the 
fictional 
bio of Ray Johnson. 
Violation: 
Public Corruption, White Collar Crime, Civil Rights 
Violation 
Questions 
What was the exact crime that occurred?: Art theft / Art Fraud / Art 
Forgery 
Does this information involve a government official? If so, what is their 
name and position/title?: no 
Do you have any evidence to support your claim or know of any witnesses 
to the crime(s)?: Yes and some evidence and witnesses who saw the art 
before it disappeared 
UNCLASSIFIED 
EFTA00020463

UNCLASSIFIED 
Re: 50D-NY
-3027571, 
08/03/2020 
Did you suffer any personal losses (financially or physically) due to the 
crime?: yes to both questions I've spent $100,000 my Dad had to give me 
to buy my stolen artwork back, but most of it I can't get back because 
it's been sold through Sotheby's in June 22, 2017 London catalogue 
artwork misattributed to a variety of artists, also the D.B. Henkel 
paintings are my stolen forged paintings, some of the Paul Tobeler stolen 
paintings are 
mine, the Adler-Beatty Ray Johnson estate 
How long has 
this activity been going on?: Since 1997 when it disappeared 
in Los Angeles, some of it 
is also in the Adelson gallery, some of it has 
been sold to Tony Podesta by a fake artist, 3 paintings are part of 
Jeffrey Epstein's estate, 1 of those falsely claimed by Petrina 
Ryan 
Kleid who used my 3 of my paintings as her college portfolio art

Additional Info: Ray johnson estate - online website - the artwork is 
listed in the 
Smithsonian museum's online art and is falsely attributed 
to a deceased person in the art gallery world 
named David Bourdain or 
Bourdan for the year 1998. It was stolen from 
me in July 1997. 
Petrina Ryan Kleid has an 
online presence and has many fake articles 
written about my artwork falsely attributed to herself. 
One of 
those paintinhs was originally a painting of Dan Quayle, but 
someone has painted over the face to make it look like George Bush Jr. 
Instead. That painting used to depict a note tacked on to the wall that 
spelled potato wrong (potatoe) which was crossed out and underneath was 
written the correct spelling of potatoes. Also, my signature used to be 
UNCLASSIFIED 
EFTA00020465

UNCLASSIFIED 
Re: 50D-NY-3027571, 08/03/2020 
on the front of the desk but it has been painted over. I usually used 
permanent marking pen ink for my signature, so it probably can be 
detected using the appropriate technologies for analyzing art. This 
applies to all of my stolen paintings. But my drawings were often signed 
in pencil but I drew my fingerprint, my dental impressions and my traced 
handprints on the Ray Johnson estate art that is listed in the 
Smithsonian. There is a lot more information about fraud and forgery 
going on with Sotheby's London 2017 and db henkel in traverse city. It 
would like to share all information in depth, so that all of these fake 
/forged worthless paintings that were stolen from me can be removed 
permanently from the big money art market and hopefully returned to me 
because they belong to me, they are sentimental personal property and I 
will never get over this until these people are stopped from their art 
fraud. Another gake artist has a serbian name Biljana Djurdjevic and 
Tony Podesta bought all of those stolen paintings of mine, including one 
that is a self portrait of myself at 19 years old. 
How is Contact Known: this is the person who owed the Serbian- Canadian 
model money who was connected to Mark Epstein, Jeffrey 
Epstein, Jean Luc Brunel, Ghislaine Maxwell, Elle McPherson and her 
manager Stuart, the professional magician J.B. Benn 
Type: Other 
Address: 
City: 
Zip:

Additional Info: His full 
name is Jeffrey Matthew Settle 
He became a very successful actor immediately 
after all my artwork 
disappeared. He also was friends with Lady Victoria 
Hervey a member of 
the aristocracy of England at the 
time when all of my paintings 
disappeared. I had shown him 
every single painting I had ever made. 
was friends with 
"a princess of Yugoslavia" but I don't 
kniw which princess this was. 
She also in recent years has been publicly 
linked to Prince Andrew. Jb Benn 
the magician was also very closely 
involved in grooming me yo meet ghislaine maxwell in New York in April 
1997 when I 
was forced by Matthew Settle to go 
week in the bedroom of his 
roommate Urim Lekaj 
who went to 
Los Angeles while I was staying in 
at JB's apartment. JB took me to 
a dinner with 
where 
Ghislaine was sitting at the table next 
contact number to send me modeling 
castings. I 
was 20 years old at that time in 1997. I am only 5 ft 3 1/2 inches tall 
and I was never photogenic enough to do modeling. It was all a scam ... 
and I 
think the goal was primarily to steal all of my artwork which 
according to sothebys, thd Smithsonian, Adler-Beatty Gallery, 
Adelson 
Gallery, DB henkel forged paintings that are my stolen paintings, ALL OF 
THE PEOPLE INVOLVED ARE 
MAKING 
MILLIONS OF DOLLARS SELLING MY STOLEN 
PAINTINGS 
WITH FORGED 
SIGNATURES 
AND FALSE PROVENANCE. 
stay with 
JB in NYC for a 
who was an 
Albanian model 
his bedroom in Manhatten 
reservations required 
to us and asked 
me for my 
looked 15 even 
though I 
How is Contact Known: He very suspiciously showed up outside an audition 
I was sent to by the parent of one of my classmates, and began a love 
fraud fake romantic relationship with me in 
July of 1996 which ended 
abruptly a year later in July 
1997 right after all of my artwork 
disappeared. He was also good friends with Mark 
Epstein who he talked 
about a lot. Instead of encouraging me to use my art 
portfolio to apply 
UNCLASSIFIED 
EFTA00020467

UNCLASSIFIED 
Re: 50D-NY
-3027571, 
08/03/2020 
to Cooper union art school in NYC where Mark Epstein was 
director and 
where the 
tuition was free, all Matthew did was tell me I needed to get a 
job waitresses at a restaurant, specifically Union Square restaurant in 
Manhattan.
